transcript: No, Carla, I'm just like you. I thought it was gonna be all peaches and roses and sand in our toes and Wind in our hair and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves and we'll have three fat rosy kids and Ha ha baby the jokes on us

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: No, Carla, I'm just like you.  I thought it was gonna be all peaches and roses and sand in our toes and wind in our hair and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves and we'll have three fat rosy kids and ha, ha, baby, the joke's on us
